name: The Golden Skull
description:
Deep in the cave lays a precious treasure: The Golden Skull. Use your dynamite to dig your way down, but pay attention to the hazards, especially to the lava.

Controls:

ARROWS  = MOVE

ARROW UP  = CLIMB

S = JUMP

A = PICKAXE

D = DYNAMITE

C = ROPE

F = FULLSCREEN

ESC = EXIT

M = SOUND ON/OFF"

Credits to Surt for the assets...
